outputs.output_descr:
1. Procurement plan established and monitored with monthly reports
    -Establish procurement plans with line ministries/PMTs for each project
    - Monitor the implementation of procurement plans of each project
    - Monitor the procedural progress of procurement plan
2. Improved financial management of implementing ministries and agencies
    - Assess the financial management system of implementing line ministries
    - Prepare a report to identify issues and recommendations
    - Monitor the compliance to the financial procedures in line with JICA regulations
    - Review the monthly disbursement plan (budget plan)
3. Capacity Development: Areas necessary for capacity building support identified and capacity development provided
    - Assess the capacity of PMTs under each project and identify any areas necessary for trainings
    - Provide capacity building to PMTs
    - Provide capacity building to implementing line ministries concerning the project management

project_descr: Loan Management Support through Fiduciary Monitoring Support Unit to the Monitoring Committee on Japanese ODA Loan Projects
project_title: Partnership Services forFiduciary Monitoring Agent/ Iraq
